summary:
Results-driven Senior Unity Mobile Game Developer with extensive experience in creating engaging mobile games and interactive applications. Proven track record in delivering high-performance, optimized mobile games with a focus on user experience and technical excellence. Core competencies include:

• Unity Game Development: Extensive experience with Unity3D, C#, and mobile game optimization
• Mobile Development: Strong background in iOS and Android development
• Performance Optimization: Expertise in mobile game optimization, memory management, and resource efficiency
• Technical Integration: Skilled in implementing third-party SDKs, analytics, and monetization features
• Team Collaboration: Experience in mentoring developers and working in Agile environments
• Problem Solving: Strong debugging and optimization capabilities

Key Achievements:
• Successfully delivered multiple Unity-based mobile games with high user engagement
• Implemented efficient optimization techniques reducing memory usage by 45%
• Integrated various monetization features including ads and in-app purchases
• Maintained consistent 5-star client ratings on Upwork for game development projects
